name: MonkeyMan
tagline: A nice perl5 library for interacting with Apache CloudStack with some cool tools included
body:
### About the project

MonkeyMan is a library can be used to write scripts for automation of administrative tasks and routines needed for maintaining your [Apache CloudStack](http://cloudstack.apache.org/) installation.

If you have any questions, please, contact me: v.melnik@tucha13.net.

![MonkeyMan](http://tucha.ua/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/monk.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
